content:
@T-libs meeting at 2022-01-12T20:00:00+01:00: @Amanieu will take us on an adventure through parking_lot and std's mutexes and condition variables, and improvements to std in this area. agenda: https://hackmd.io/gTsKKtGSTEyWBmhQ3NuZCg

@T-libs-api meeting at 2022-01-12T21:00:00+01:00: agenda: https://hackmd.io/k_juc5iqRISjYhTeY4QVbA
@T-libs Meeting time! agenda/notes: https://hackmd.io/gTsKKtGSTEyWBmhQ3NuZCg jitsi: https://meet.jit.si/rust-libs-meeting-ujepnbwg2lzqgt6wvrndwimi

I've summarized our conclusions from this libs meeting as much as I could remember them, and made a overview of what needs to be done for improved mutexes / parking lot integration: https://hackmd.io/yk19dGHlRXiuakaybBASXw?view

@Amanieu For the history I mostly wrote down the things that I've worked on last year, because I still remember those. I'm probably missing a lot that happened on your side, and probably forgetting some things from the meeting too. So feel free to complete the document.

I'll post this document as a tracking issue on rust-lang/rust some time next week, so we can keep track of this effort.
